Activity: Arrive, settle in. Start the day with a cup of ginger tea for focus. Do a quick breathing exercise before checking emails.
Check the help desk system. Review any updates on the report generation issue escalated yesterday, and address any new tickets.

If @DA-2 and @ITPM-1 have identified the cause of the report generation failure, follow their instructions to implement a fix or workaround. This may involve modifying the report configuration or updating the data source.
Thoroughly test the solution to the report generation issue in a test environment to ensure it is working correctly and does not introduce any new problems.
Schedule a time with @CLINLEAD-1 to deploy the fix to the live system. Provide clear instructions on how to verify the report is now generating correctly.
Update the internal knowledge base with the solution to the report generation issue. Close the help desk ticket.

Address a new ticket from @QATEST-1 reporting a potential data quality issue in a newly implemented module of the EHR. Gather details about the specific data field, patient records, and the expected vs. actual values.
Lunch break. Visit the hospital chapel for some quiet reflection.

Investigate the data quality issue reported by @QATEST-1. Review the data entry process, the data validation rules, and the system's audit logs. This may require consulting with @HIS-2 to understand the data definitions.
If the data quality issue is confirmed, document the problem in detail and escalate it to @DA-1, @QATEST-2 and @ITPM-1 for further investigation and resolution.
Address smaller, quick-fix tickets to keep the queue moving. Perhaps a password reset for @PCHMP-1.
Check the EHR vendor's website or online forum for any known issues or updates related to the EHR system or data collection problems.

Work on documenting common troubleshooting steps for frequent EHR system issues and data collection problems. This will help to streamline the help desk process and reduce the time required to resolve future issues.
Prepare a summary of the day's activities and plan for tomorrow.
